title: Web-Based Real-Time Language Education Program Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Situations requiring real-time interaction and effective assessment implementation in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic communicative functions (greetings, questions, explanations) of the target language with over 80% accuracy for real-time communication in digital environments
Learners can complete language practice assignments with peers twice or more weekly through a mobile-optimized platform
Learners can achieve a minimum score of 70 or higher in the comprehensive assessment (speaking/listening) using evaluation tools accessible solely via mobile devices.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
